title: Eggplant with Garlic and Herbs
introduction: Eggplant with Garlic and Herbs, also known as Melanzane al Forno, is a delightful summer dish that features the unique flavor of Japanese eggplants roasted to perfection with a blend of fresh garlic and basil. This recipe brings out the best in seasonal produce, making it a perfect addition to your warm-weather cooking repertoire.
ingredients: 8 small Japanese eggplants (all about the same size)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Place a rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400Â°F. Oil a large baking pan.
Trim the stem ends from the eggplants and cut them in half lengthwise. Cut several shallow slits in the cut surfaces. Arrange the eggplants cut-sides up in the baking pan.
In a small bowl, mix together the oil, garlic, basil, and salt and pepper to taste. Spread the mixture over the eggplants, pushing a little into the slits.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until the eggplants are tender. Serve hot or at room temperature.
